TitleEnglish: My Wife is the Student Council President
SummaryEnglish: The story begins with Izumi Hayato running to be student body president. But when a beautiful girl swings in promising the liberalization of love while flinging condoms into the audience, he ends up losing to her and becoming the vice president. At the student council meeting, the newly-elected president invites herself over to Izumi's house, where she promptly announces she is to become Izumi's wife thanks to an agreement that their parents had made, a drunken promise decades ago that their children would one day become husband and wife. Naturally Hayato is against this, but Ui has the complete opposite reaction, and even wants to live with him! Will the upset Hayato and the overenthusiastic Ui be able to manage their school and marital life while keeping it a secret from the other students? Or will the two never come to understand each other's feelings?
Aliases: My Wife is the Student Council President!
My Wife is the Student Council President! Plus!
My Wife is the Student Council President!+!

1.TitleEnglish: Student Council President and Bath Play
1.SummaryEnglish: Bundled with the limited edition ninth manga volume.

15.TitleEnglish: Student Council President and Bath Play - Wife Theater
15.SummaryEnglish: At school, Hayato's hand was injured from saving Ui from falling off of the ladder while placing a poster on the school board, then Rin and the others shows up. Later Ui tries to heal Hayato's hand, but things go wrong while bathing. Note: Seven short comedy specials from the DVD of the OAD bundled with the limited edition of the 9th compiled volume of manga.

1.TitleEnglish: The Student Council President Marries into a Family
1.SummaryEnglish: A pushy woman barges into the vice chairperson's home, and he's left with no choice but to share his home.

2.TitleEnglish: Student Council President and Dinner at Home
2.SummaryEnglish: Against his will, their shacking up begins. Ui shows that she can wear two different hats: president and wife!

3.TitleEnglish: Student Council President and the Hand-Holding Experiment
3.SummaryEnglish: "Aggressive PDA disrupts campus morals!" The head prefect faces off against the student council president! Let's carry out "Love Liberation"!!!

4.TitleEnglish: Shelter from the Rain Without the President
4.SummaryEnglish: Love Hotel. Oh, Love Hotel. Love Hotel. Hayato and Rin go to a Love Hotel! Is that okay?! Will everything be okay?!

5.SummaryEnglish: Making up. Yes, making up. Making up. When people make up, they usually do this and that… Is that okay?! Will everything be okay?!

7.SummaryEnglish: Misumi-san moves… next to Hayato-kun! Will his crazy shacking up be noticed???

8.TitleEnglish: The Vice President and the Two Infirmary Devils
8.SummaryEnglish: "The panties and lipstick both belong to me!!!" Misumi-san, and Misumi-san closing in on Hayato-kun. Will this end well?!

9.SummaryEnglish: "We need to talk…" Ui has a secret. Will it finally be revealed?!

10.SummaryEnglish: Sawatari-san closes in on Hayato's house. Huh?! Now even Sawatari-san is chasing after him? What're you gonna do about it, Hayato-kun?!

12.SummaryEnglish: "Please, let me have your daughter's hand!!!" What's going to happen now???

2.SummaryEnglish: Hayato's tumultuous life with the student council president and self-appointed wife continues... The secret romantic relationship between Hayato Izumi and Ui Wakana has become more "exciting" with Honoka Saijō, chair of the photography club, starting stalking Wakana for possible scoops.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ui wants Hayato to be more affectionate with her...and she'll do anything to get what she wants! But when he isn't responsive enough, she takes matters into her own hands...

2.TitleEnglish: Late Summer Festival with the Disciplinary Committee Head
2.SummaryEnglish: Hayato accidentally sees Rin's breasts! And now he can't stop thinking about it. She comes up with an unexpected way to fix this...

3.TitleEnglish: The Student Council President and the Photography Club President
3.SummaryEnglish: The campus photography club has an underground website! They have candid etchi shots of campus girls...and some blackmail-worthy shots of Izumi-kun and Rin from the festival...?!

4.SummaryEnglish: Hayato and Rin find themselves in danger of committing "indecent coed relations" while trying to stop another couple of students for doing the same thing.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ui is sweating, burning up, moaning and gasping for air...because she has a cold. Hayato tries to keep his libido in check, but as the evening wears on, that gets harder and harder...

6.SummaryEnglish: Ayane wants to know what it's like to have a boyfriend, so Hayato is enlisted to be her boyfriend for the day. But how does out student council president handle this...?

7.TitleEnglish: The Unrelenting Battle of the President and the Disciplinary Committee Head
7.SummaryEnglish: Rin finds out that Hayato and Ui are living together! Infuriated and shocked, she has to snoop around for evidence of foul play...and get in their way as much as possible.

8.TitleEnglish: The President's Efforts and Winter's Temptations
8.SummaryEnglish: Hayato and Ui are enjoying a relaxing evening at home eating dinner and studying. But they're bothered by Rin's numerous visits to her sister's place next door.

9.TitleEnglish: The Photography Club President's Hidden Desire
9.SummaryEnglish: Saijou wants to know what romance is like! And she wants to capture it on camera between Hayato...and whichever girl draws the winning slip of paper.

10.TitleEnglish: The President and Disciplinary Committee Head's Troubles
10.SummaryEnglish: Test scores are up and campus life has generally improved since Ui took office. But Rin still feels a little unsettled. Maybe if she tried dating someone, she would understand Ui's methods. But she insists she doesn't have a crush...

11.TitleEnglish: The Vice President and Treasurer Make Some Kind of Progress
11.SummaryEnglish: While on the way to school, Hayato discovers that Karen isn't wearing panties. He spends the rest of the day trying to avoid seeing under her skirt...but Karen still seems a little upset.

12.TitleEnglish: A Holy Night with the President and All the Rest
12.SummaryEnglish: Rin proposes a Holiday party with the student council and disciplinary committee. During this, Hayato's secret life as a crossdresser comes to light.
